title: Loopy Numbers
description: Write a program that prints all the numbers from 1 to 100, but for multiples of 3, print 'Loop' instead of the number. For multiples of 5, print 'Py'. For numbers which are multiples of both 3 and 5, print 'LoopPy'. Use a for loop to iterate through the numbers and conditional statements to check for multiples.
sample_output: 1, 2, Loop, 4, Py, Loop, 7, 8, Loop, Py, 11, Loop, 13, 14, LoopPy, ...
